title: for an amenity having users like (e
clause_text: for an amenity having users like (e.g. Educational / Health-care facility etc.) and under control of private person(s)/ organization(s) such allotment shall be at 25 % of ASR Rate for constructed area up to 40 Sq. Meters and at 50% of ASR Rate for constructed area above 40 Sq. Meters.
section: Terms of Allotment of Rehabilitation Tenements â€“
